description:
Minutes from QUT's Kelvin Grove campus and a collection of hospitals, this tri-level property will impress with its modern interiors and high-end finishes. Only a stone's throw from the heart of Brisbane's CBD, this exceptional residence is perfect for professionals, couples, medical-workers and investors alike.

Showcasing a refined contemporary aesthetic, the townhome is presented with elegant Hamptons-inspired oak floors and a monochromatic colour palette. Louvered windows and full-height glass are also featured, allowing natural light to flow throughout the property.

Forming the heart of the residence, a generous open-plan living and dining area is positioned on the middle level. Glass sliding doors seamlessly connect this central space to a covered balcony capturing beautiful district views. You will also find a grassed rear courtyard framed by landscaped gardens. An immaculate kitchen displays stone benchtops, Smeg appliances and ample cupboard storage.

Upstairs, two ensuited bedrooms are both fitted with built-in robes. Perfect for guests or older generations, another ensuited bedroom encompassing a built-in robe is on the ground level. There is also a dedicated study that those who work from home will appreciate.

Benefitting from a secure single garage and visitor parking for another car, the townhome also includes laundry facilities, air-conditioning, ceiling fans and superb storage.

Close to a plethora of shops and dining options, this fantastic property is near the soon-to-be-reimagined Victoria Park and Newmarket Village Shopping Centre. The Royal Brisbane and Women's and Saint Andrew's War Memorial hopsitals are easily accessible from this address, as well.

Set within the Kelvin Grove State College catchment area, this incredible residence is also a short drive from Saint Finbarr's Primary School, Saint Ambrose's School and Mount Saint Michael's College. Do not delay – call to arrange an inspection today.

Disclaimer
This property is being sold by auction or without a price and therefore a price guide can not be provided. The website may have filtered the property into a price bracket for website functionality purposes
